headline: Hilton Worldwide : Expands Footprint in India’s Diamond City with the Opening of Garden Inn Surat City Centre
summary: SURAT, India - Hilton today announced the opening of Hilton Garden Inn Surat City Centre, marking the debut of its globally recognised focused service brand, Hilton Garden Inn, in Gujarat. This...
